titles.title: Reduce Individuals' Dependence on Energy Act of 2006
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide individuals a deduction for certain mass public transportation expenses.
Reduce Individuals' Dependence on Energy Act of 2006
RIDE Act of 2006

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: Reduce Individuals' Dependence on Energy Act of 2006 or the RIDE Act of 2006 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow individual taxpayers a deduction from gross income for transportation expenses on federal, state, or local government mass transit facilities.
